title: Trulia Real Estate Scraper Input
description: Scrape real estate listings from Trulia.com. Provide a location (state/city) or a direct Trulia search URL.

start_url.title: Start URL
start_url.description: Direct Trulia search URL. If provided, this will be used instead of location.

location.title: Location
location.description: State code or city name to search (e.g., 'NY', 'Los Angeles'). Used if Start URL is not provided.

results_wanted.title: Results Wanted
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of listings to collect. Pagination is calculated automatically.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings. Residential proxies recommended for Trulia.
